muy buen juego lo malo lleno de xiters .. atte el mil caras

This game is too difficult, I literally don't even get a chance to try and shoot the enemy players before I'm head-shotted from across the map. If you say Git Gud, your part of the problem. I give this game a 5/10, only because I enjoyed the training mode with bots, unless you enjoy losing to people who play this game every day of their lives, don't get it.

P.S.
I know it's free now, but there are better options, *cough* TF2 *cough*, that don't suffer from the stupendously high-skill cap that CS:GO has.

Très bon jeu dans l'ensemble, le seul inconvénient majeur est le nombre de cheater qui est assez énorme et le problème c'est qu'il ne se font pas kick par leurs teamates et donc ruines les games de leurs adversaires ce qui est très chiant en ranked !!

It's a trip and mind boggling experience, you'll say its shit, but we'll see each other in lobby or  on matchmaking the next day!
GLHF
